      Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 A result of an intersection that is really a line
      class  OOB
      Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 A marker for a result that is out of bounds.
      class  Point3d
      Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 A 3 element point that is represented by double precision floating point x,y,z coordinates.
      class  Vector3d
      Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 A 3-element vector that is represented by double-precision floating point x,y,z coordinates.
